org.apache.mina.core.write

Class WriteException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • org.apache.mina.core.write.WriteException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NothingWrittenException, WriteTimeoutException, WriteToClosedSessionException

    public class WriteException
extends IOException
    An exception which is thrown when one or more write operations failed.
    Author:
    Apache MINA Project
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRequests

        public List<WriteRequest> getRequests()
        Returns:
        the list of the failed WriteRequest, in the order of occurrence.
